# Lab exercises - Dr. Arbuthnot's baptism records (25 points)

You can find the lab [here](http://openintrostat.github.io/oilabs-tidy/01_intro_to_r/intro_to_r.html)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(openintro)
```
:::

### Exercise 1 (2 points)

Insert any text here.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
arbuthnot$girls
```

::: {.cell-output-stdout}
```

[16] 3997 3919 3395 3536 3181 2746 2722 2840 2908 2959 3179 3349 3382 3289 3013
[31] 2781 3247 4107 4803 4881 5681 4858 4319 5322 5560 5829 5719 6061 6120 5822
[46] 5738 5717 5847 6203 6033 6041 6299 6533 6744 7158 7127 7246 7119 7214 7101
[61] 7167 7302 7392 7316 7483 6647 6713 7229 7767 7626 7452 7061 7514 7656 7683
```

### Exercise 2 (3 points)

Insert any text here.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
arbuthnot %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = girls)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](hw1_lab_answers_files/figure-html/trend-girls-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
arbuthnot %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = year, y = girls))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](hw1_lab_answers_files/figure-html/trend-girls-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

### Exercise 3 (4 points)

Insert any text here.

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
arbuthnot %>%
  mutate(prop_boys = boys / (boys + girls)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(year, prop_boys))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](hw1_lab_answers_files/figure-html/plot-prop-boys-arbuthnot-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

### Exercise 7 (5 points)

```{.r .cell-code}
  arrange(desc(total))
```
